name: Gigachad Survivals
description:
Gigachad Survivals is a casual game with an emphasis on humor and memes with elements of a simplistic RPG. Here, every decision you make can cause an avalanche of consequences for the hordes of enemies you have to fight!

Gigachad Survivors is a time-based survival game with minimalistic gameplay and simplistic RPG elements.
All you have to do is survive as long as you can, but one day death will surely put an end to your struggles as well. Gain experience, use different play styles, and survive as long as possible!

Game Features:
A huge variety of weapons and features;
A variety of enemies that gain power over time, just like you;
Three characters to choose from, each with their own unique look, weapons and characteristics;
Infinite replayability;
